mapper.insert: INSERT INTO groupUser (userID, isAdmin, groupID) VALUES (#{userID}, #{isAdmin}, #{groupID});
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as attendance FROM (SELECT UP.userID, COUNT(*) AS count, UP.problemID, GU.groupID as gID FROM YeeunJ.userProblem AS UP, YeeunJ.groupUser AS GU WHERE GU.groupID = #{groupID} AND GU.userID = UP.userID and DATE_FORMAT(UP.regdate,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND UP.problemID IN (SELECT GP.problemID FROM YeeunJ.groupProblem AS GP, YeeunJ.groupGoal AS GG WHERE GG.groupID = #{groupID} AND GP.goalID = GG.id) GROUP BY userID) AS GP
SELECT count(*) as totalGroupUser FROM YeeunJ.groupUser where groupID = #{groupID}
